textBox.richText: It’s sad that I feel the same way about this. Our politicians “borrowed” money from our Social Security Fund to pay off deficits....but we’ll never see that money again. With people pushing to have Social Security privatized, we’ll just loose all our money just like everyone lost everything in Enron. It’s time for change......it’s time for Ron Paul.
...‘Cause you have to be asleep to believe it..
